content:
There are plenty of other things to do in D.C. besides visiting historical sites. Here are a few fun ideas:

1. Visit the National Zoo and see the pandas
2. Take a stroll through Georgetown and do some shopping
3. Explore the trendy neighborhood of Adams Morgan and try some international cuisine
4. Visit the United States Botanic Garden and see the beautiful, diverse flora
5. Take a bike ride along the Capital Crescent Trail
6. Check out the many museums and galleries in the Dupont Circle neighborhood
7. Catch a show or concert at the Kennedy Center
8. Take a water taxi ride on the Potomac River
9. Go ice-skating at the National Gallery of Art Sculpture Garden during the winter months
10. Attend a Nationals baseball game at Nationals Park
